# API

## Version

### [GET /api/version](../server/src/routes/version.js#L49)

Retrieve version information about the running server.

Example response
```json
{
  "gitHash": "331d54dc84a46d12e15bdc9e7b16aacf2f2741a9",
  "gitBranch": "develop"
}
```
